<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Cannibalize Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=4049) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="All Ancestries" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=467" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 127</row>

**Frequency**
once per day

**Prerequisites**
[Fey Influence](/Feats.aspx?ID=1239)

</column>

---

The fey magic inside of you is a vital part of your body, and you can steal other sources of magic to replenish yours. You can draw power from your magical equipment to replenish your health. You drain one of your [invested](/Traits.aspx?ID=98) items, in the process regaining Hit Points equal to double the item's level.

 In addition, you can attempt a [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) check with a total bonus equal to 10 + the drained item's level against one effect that gave you the [drained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10), [doomed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=9), [enfeebled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13), [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=15), or [slowed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35) condition. If you succeed, you reduce the chosen condition's value by 1.

 An item drained by this action becomes non-magical until the next time you make your daily preparations.

**Special** This feat gains the trait appropriate for your ancestry ([human](/Traits.aspx?ID=90) for [human](/Ancestries.aspx?ID=6), [goblin](/Traits.aspx?ID=81) for [goblin](/Ancestries.aspx?ID=4), etc.).
name: Cannibalize Magic
